thread.title: Who does the LSU offense need to step forward as Option No. 2?: Poll
thread.title_full: Who does the LSU offense need to step forward as Option No. 2?: Poll | NOLA.com

author: Randy Rosetta, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune
title: Who does the LSU offense need to step forward as Option No. 2?: Poll
text:
Think it's safe to say that Leonard Fournette is well-established as Option 1 for the LSU offense this season. Moving back into SEC play for the next two weeks, though, the Tigers are obviously going to have to diversify.
That means somebody has to emerge as the top secondary option pretty quickly with No. 7/5-ranked LSU (4-0, 2-0 SEC) still trying to find some offensive balance.
Who do think that No. 2 guy needs to be starting this week at South Carolina? Or does it need to be a collective effort by one group?
Vote in the poll below and tell us why in the comment stream below.
